content:
Hi, I just installed lean after playing around with the wasm version online and it looks like importing doesn't work the same way here. The data package I was previously able to access with just import data... is wrapped in init and importing tactic does not work at all.

Is this a known problem and does anyone know how to fix it?
Did you follow the instructions on how to install tools such as leanproject on the community website?
Oh, I was supposed to create a package and leanproject add-mathlib... it works now, thank you!
Aaron Bies has marked this topic as resolved.
